nodes.text: The Third Legion was a unit at the time the Clone Wars. Around 21 BBY, a large-scale civil war erupted on the planet Balith, and Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi dispatched Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and Clone Captain CT-7567 to the world to command the legion.
The Third Legion was first mentioned in "Assassin," an episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' third season, which aired on October 22, 2010.
